q: In an interview, Mr. Page said those management skills were something he observed during the decade he spent learning from Mr. Eric Schmidt . "He's a global statesman, all the way," he said. Eric Schmidt 's very good at bringing people together, getting people to agree. In the interview, Mr. Page and Mr. Sergey Brin provided a few hints about their priorities when Mr. Page returns to the top.
